title: Add Filtering and Search to TaskList
description: Extend the TaskList component with search, status filtering, and sorting capabilities.
instructions:
Create a FilteredTaskList component that:
1. Adds a search input that filters tasks by title or description (case-insensitive)
2. Adds status filter buttons: 'All', 'Active', 'Completed'
3. Adds sort options: newest first, oldest first, or by completion status
4. Uses useState hooks to manage all filter state
5. Implements filtering logic in separate pure functions

testCases.description: Search filters tasks by title or description case-insensitively
Status filter correctly shows all, active, or completed tasks
Sort function orders tasks by date or status

hints: Use toLowerCase() on both the search term and task text for case-insensitive matching
The useMemo hook helps avoid recalculating filters on every render
When sorting by date, convert createdAt strings to Date objects with new Date()
commonMistakes: Forgetting to spread the array before sorting (sort mutates the original array)
Not handling empty search terms which should return all tasks
